name: SpitFire
description:
SpitFire is a multiplayer third person aerial combat game where players are given a variety of objectives in order to gain points and win the match. Through a combination of defeating enemies with a variety of attacks and collecting treasure that upgrades your base, players fight for control of the arena.

Controls

***Controller Recommended***

Keyboard:

  • WASD: Flight
  • Space Bar: Fire Primary
  • Shift: Dash
  • Tab: Fire Special
  • B: Hover(hold)

Controller(Xbox Controller Layout Below):

  • Left Stick: Flight
  • Right Trigger: Fire Primary
  • A: Dash
  • RB / Y: Fire Special
  • Left Trigger / B: Hover(hold)
  • LB: Roll(hold)
